properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) as COUNT FROM NOTICE WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , REGIST_DATE , USER_ID , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC) as RNUM FROM NOTICE N JOIN USERS U ON (N.USER_NO = U.USER_NO) WHERE N.STATUS = 'Y' ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_NO = ?
UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICE_TITLE = ? , NOTICE_CONTENT = ? WHERE NOTICE_NO = ?
UPDATE NOTICE SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE NOTICE_NO = ?
